sys_generative_ai_config.name: Prompt name

parent.display_value: OneExtend Capability Definition: Digital Product Factory Assistants

sys_generative_ai_config.prompt: You are a ServiceNow developer. Create a series of variables for a ServiceNow record producer to serve a program with this description {{program_description}} that serves the {{record_type}} function. Consider these fields as possibilities for the label values, but add your own: {{suggested_fields}}. Render the output in a JSON format so that a ServiceNow workflow can create the variables and add them to an existing record producer. Add a short description of the service as short_description and the name of the record producer as title to the JSON data set. You can only return the JSON result and nothing else.
